featured.description: Building the evaluation and observability stack for AI agents. Leading development of LLM judges, tracing infrastructure, and quality metrics. Previously worked on ML model and data monitoring.
Worked on controllable NLG at the intersection of natural language processing and advertising theory. Awarded Siebel Scholar 2023. Advised by Hari Sundaram and Ewa Maslowska.
Worked on integrating faster sparse matrix multiplication kernels into PyTorch to accelerate large language models like BERT. Advised by Wen-mei Hwu.

other.description: Worked on the Research Science team monitoring data pipeline and model health. Built ranking models for ad optimization.
Built multimodal ad classification systems on the Ads Responsibility and Privacy team.
Worked on multilingual language models for the AI Commerce Multimodal team.
Built enterprise NER systems on the NLP services team.
